snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the web include a report of Snapchat receiving funding from an undisclosed source. Plus, meet the robot telemarketer who denies she’s a robot.
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the web include a report of Snapchat receiving funding from an undisclosed source. Plus, meet the robot telemarketer who denies she’s a robot.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Snapchat Raises $50 Million, and Encountering an All-Too Convincing Robot
